===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Neuvillette)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' Thank you for inviting me to partake in this activity. I can assure you I will fully devote myself to the match.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Neuvillette's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' Hmm, no matter.

;(When the player defeats two of Neuvillette's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' Perhaps a bit more thought is in order.

;(When Neuvillette defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' Forgive me.

;(When Neuvillette uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' I believe the floor is now mine.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' An indisputable victory. You have my congratulations.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' A memorable match indeed. Regardless of the outcome, a faceoff with a worthy competitor is time well spent.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Neuvillette)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' I am most amenable to some friendly competition. Should we invite a third party to shuffle the cards?
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Neuvillette's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' Hmm, this is still far from over.

;(When the player defeats two of Neuvillette's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card neuvillette ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' ...A grave oversight.

;(When Neuvillette defeats one of the player's Character Cards)

;(If the player loses the match)
